languages.text: "Тяжкое испытание для друкари. Затяжные сражения в реальном мире требуют от нас... особой отдачи и жестокости". {n}Маражай оглядывает поле боя, на его лице возникает недоумение.{/n} "Хм. Странно".

traits.locale_text: "Тактика, {name}. Сражения в реальном мире требуют от нас... особой отдачи, чтобы не слышать шепот Той, Что Жаждет. Придает остроты. Повышает ставки". {n}Маражай облизывается с голодным видом.{/n} "Одна мысль о качестве страха, что испытывают мои сородичи в такие минуты, наполняет меня желанием".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "A heavy ordeal for Drukhari. Protracted battles in realspace require... particular dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai gazes around the battlefield with a look of confusion on his face.{/n} "Hmm. Strange."
languages.original_text: "Тяжкое испытание для друкари. Затяжные сражения в реальном мире требуют от нас... особой отдачи и жестокости". {n}Маражай оглядывает поле боя, на его лице возникает недоумение.{/n} "Хм. Странно".

traits.locale_text: "This is an ordeal for the Drukhari. Protracted battles in the realspace require... inordinate dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai looks around the battlefield with a look of bewilderment on his face.{/n} "Hm-m. This is strange."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is an ordeal for the Drukhari. Protracted battles in the realspace require... inordinate dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai looks around the battlefield with a look of bewilderment on his face.{/n} "Hm-m. This is strange."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A heavy ordeal for Drukhari. Protracted battles in realspace require... particular dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai gazes around the battlefield with a look of confusion on his face.{/n} "Hmm. Strange."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Eine schlimme Tortur für Drukhari. Langgezogene Schlachten im Realraum erfordern ... eine besondere Hingabe und Wildheit." {n}Marazhai betrachtet mit einem verwirrten Blick das Schlachtfeld.{/n} "Hmm. Merkwürdig."
languages.original_text: "A heavy ordeal for Drukhari. Protracted battles in realspace require... particular dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai gazes around the battlefield with a look of confusion on his face.{/n} "Hmm. Strange."

traits.locale_text: "Eine schlimme Tortur für Drukhari. Langgezogene Schlachten im Realraum erfordern ... eine besondere Hingabe und Wildheit." {n}Marazhai betrachtet mit einem verwirrten Blick das Schlachtfeld.{/n} "Hmm. Merkwürdig."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “这对黑暗灵族而言是个沉重的考验。若是在真实世界中进行持久战，需要……极其凶猛、奋不顾身。”{n}玛拉斋面带疑惑地环顾战场。{/n}“嗯，真奇怪。”
languages.original_text: "A heavy ordeal for Drukhari. Protracted battles in realspace require... particular dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai gazes around the battlefield with a look of confusion on his face.{/n} "Hmm. Strange."

traits.locale_text: “这对黑暗灵族而言是个沉重的考验。若是在真实世界中进行持久战，需要……极其凶猛、奋不顾身。”{n}玛拉斋面带疑惑地环顾战场。{/n}“嗯，真奇怪。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Une terrible épreuve pour les Drukharis. Les batailles prolongées dans l'espace réel nécessitent... Une férocité et un dévouement extraordinaires. » {n}Marazhai parcourt le champ de bataille d'un regard confus.{/n} « Hmm... Étrange. »
languages.original_text: "A heavy ordeal for Drukhari. Protracted battles in realspace require... particular dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai gazes around the battlefield with a look of confusion on his face.{/n} "Hmm. Strange."

traits.locale_text: « Une terrible épreuve pour les Drukharis. Les batailles prolongées dans l'espace réel nécessitent... Une férocité et un dévouement extraordinaires. » {n}Marazhai parcourt le champ de bataille d'un regard confus.{/n} « Hmm... Étrange. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Es una carga pesada para los Drukhari. Las batallas prolongadas en el espacio real exigen... especial dedicación y ferocidad». {n}Marazhai mira a su alrededor, recorriendo el campo de batalla con una mirada confusa.{/n} «Qué extraño».
languages.original_text: "A heavy ordeal for Drukhari. Protracted battles in realspace require... particular dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai gazes around the battlefield with a look of confusion on his face.{/n} "Hmm. Strange."

traits.locale_text: «Es una carga pesada para los Drukhari. Las batallas prolongadas en el espacio real exigen... especial dedicación y ferocidad». {n}Marazhai mira a su alrededor, recorriendo el campo de batalla con una mirada confusa.{/n} «Qué extraño».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「デュカーリのための厳しい試練。リアルスペースでの長い戦いは…すさまじい根気と残忍さを要する」{n}マラズハイは困惑の表情を浮かべて戦いの場をぐるりと見渡す。{/n}「むぅ、奇妙だ」
languages.original_text: "A heavy ordeal for Drukhari. Protracted battles in realspace require... particular dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai gazes around the battlefield with a look of confusion on his face.{/n} "Hmm. Strange."

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリのための厳しい試練。リアルスペースでの長い戦いは…すさまじい根気と残忍さを要する」{n}マラズハイは困惑の表情を浮かべて戦いの場をぐるりと見渡す。{/n}「むぅ、奇妙だ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Drukhariler için zorlu bir sınavdır. Gerçekuzaydaki uzun süreli çatışmalar... Çokça adanmışlık ve hiddet gerektirir." {n}Marazhai, kafası karışık bir yüz ifadesiyle savaş alanına bakıyor.{/n} "Hımm. Tuhaf."
languages.original_text: "A heavy ordeal for Drukhari. Protracted battles in realspace require... particular dedication and ferocity." {n}Marazhai gazes around the battlefield with a look of confusion on his face.{/n} "Hmm. Strange."

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari için zorlu bir sınavdır. Gerçekuzaydaki uzun süreli çatışmalar... Ekstra adanmışlık ve hiddet gerektirir." {n}Marazhai savaş alanına kafası karışık bir yüz ifadesiyle bakıyor.{/n} "Hımm. Tuhaf."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
